publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-2110 Chris Ballance: Safeguarding Rural Shops—That the Parliament notes with alarm that proposals being considered by the Office of Fair Trading (OFT) to deregulate the system of wholesale distribution of newspapers and magazines could jeopardise the guaranteed distribution of publications to rural retailers, and believes that the Scottish Executive should make representations to the OFT without delay to guarantee consumers continuing access to a wide range of reasonably priced publications and diminish the threat of closure to rural village shops.
S2M-2110 Safeguarding Rural Shops (lodged on 6 December 2004) Carolyn Leckie*, Patrick Harvie*, Eleanor Scott*, Mrs Margaret Ewing*, Stewart Stevenson*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*
S2M-2110 Safeguarding Rural Shops (lodged on 6 December 2004) Shiona Baird*, Mark Ballard*, Donald Gorrie*, Tommy Sheridan*, John Swinburne*

S2M-2110 Chris Ballance: Safeguarding Rural Shops—That the Parliament notes with alarm that proposals being considered by the Office of Fair Trading (OFT) to deregulate the system of wholesale distribution of newspapers and magazines could jeopardise the guaranteed distribution of publications to rural retailers, and believes that the Scottish Executive should make representations to the OFT without delay to guarantee consumers continuing access to a wide range of reasonably priced publications and diminish the threat of closure to rural village shops. Supported by: Carolyn Leckie, Patrick Harvie, Eleanor Scott, Mrs Margaret Ewing, Stewart Stevenson, Ms Rosemary Byrne, Shiona Baird, Mark Ballard, Donald Gorrie, Tommy Sheridan, John Swinburne, Rosie Kane*
S2M-2110 Safeguarding Rural Shops (lodged on 6 December 2004) Robin Harper*, Frances Curran*
S2M-2110 Safeguarding Rural Shops (lodged on 6 December 2004) Christine Grahame*, Mr Adam Ingram*
S2M-2110 Safeguarding Rural Shops (lodged on 6 December 2004) Ms Sandra White*
S2M-2110 Safeguarding Rural Shops (lodged on 6 December 2004) Mr Jamie Stone*
S2M-2110 Safeguarding Rural Shops (lodged on 6 December 2004) Linda Fabiani*
